turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Ferdinand von Zeppelin.
turn.1: What are some of the accomplishments of Ferdinand von Zeppelin?
turn.2: The final financial breakthrough only came after the Zeppelin LZ 4 was destroyed by fire at Echterdingen after breaking free of its moorings during a storm.
turn.3: What happened after it was destroyed?
turn.4: The airship's earlier flights had excited public interest in the development of the airships, and a subsequent collection campaign raised over 6 million German marks.
turn.5: What did they do with the money?
turn.6: The money was used to create the 'Luftschiffbau-Zeppelin GmbH' and the Zeppelin foundation ("Zeppelin Stiftung").
turn.8: Following the destruction of LZ 4, LZ 3, which had been damaged when the floating hangar broke free of its mooring during a storm, was repaired: at the same time it was lengthened by 8 m.
turn.10: It was re-inflated on 21 October 1908 and after a series of short test flights a flight lasting 5 hours 55 minutes took place on 27 October with the Kaiser's brother, Admiral Prince Heinrich, on board.
turn.11: Did he go with anyone else?
turn.12: On 7 November, with Crown Prince William as a passenger, it flew to Donaueschingen, where the Kaiser was then staying.
